summary: In Chapter 03, Jack grapples with the weight of his past as he renovates a building that unexpectedly triggers memories of his childhood. Evie's warning about the mysterious disappearances of past workers haunts him, pulling him deeper into his own buried emotions and memories of joy and despair. As Jack explores the building, he feels its connection to his history, confronting unsettling memories of family strife intertwined with moments of happiness. The renovation evolves from a simple task to an intense emotional excavation, forcing him to confront his regrets and sor
